citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Access and inspection of records and property.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15-4:30 PM
on 10/02/2014.
